reviews.review_msg: Honestly, awesome.

I've always hated English with a passion, and this prof makes me hate it more. Lectures were awfully boring, free verse poems were utter trash. The final was unexpectedly doable, and the workload was very good. But this prof does nothing to make the class engaging. Make sure you take lots of notes in class, b/c he posts barely anything.

Though hes a good speaker and fun to listen to, He rambles and makes you not totally sure what you learnt. Showed interesting videos and websites which made poetry inspiring. Not enough time during the final. Felt unprepared. Practice exam = almost exactly the final. Learn Scansion and all poem meanings on your own before the exam.

I don't know how or why she became a professor. No one in their right mind would have given this woman a degree to teach. She rambles on about NOTHING in class and expects you to know it for the final. She went behind her word about the final and constantly changed it. I have never disliked a professor this much in my whole life. PASS.

Anne Higgins is the WORST PROFESSOR I HAVE EVER HAD. She CONSTANTLY calls people out in class for being on their laptops FOR TAKING NOTES. She whistled at us to get our attention. She is SO rude and SO unorganized. She didn't have our course outline for a month. She is retiring this year so no one will have to suffer being in her AWFUL class.

Lectures were genuinely entertaining for how laughable they were. Refused to use a mic, but yet talks quieter than a mouse. Class was easy af though. You can google most of the poems she uses making the textbooks useless.
Professor Higgin's lectures are unhelpful, and incredibly boring. She reads off of her notes word for word which is not engaging at all. She can be rude and come off inconsiderate to students.

I don't know where your rating came from. Dr. Deroo was an AMAZING prof. He is so passionate and you can't help but love the way he says poetry. I hate english with a passion, and can honestly say that now I have a new found respect for poetry.
THe lectures were enjoyable.. his analogies of peotry are fascinating! He is a very hard marker, which makes his class challenging, but worthwile to take.
unorganized and hard marker
a prof that ACTUALLY teaches and can get through to you!the guy LOVES poetry too.
lectures were really enjoyable, he makes complex ideas accessible and is quite funny

Professor Everton is seriously one of the most interesting profs I've ever had. Super smart guy, knows how to keep an audience paying attention. Lectures are extremely engaging and he does a great job of breaking the poem down to the core. I would take this class again! No textbook, just make sure you take notes on his interpretation of the poems.

holy crap is this guy awesome! so passionate and well-spoken and articulate. this class was also easy as hell and a great GPA booster. not to mention the amazing, well dressed eye candy at the front of the room

Do not take this class with this prof...all he does it talk about what he thinks a certain poem means...you will walk out of this course learning nothing but "flemings interpretations of poems"....i studied very hard in this class but still only ended up with a B+....plus the final is murder !!!

Very interesting lectures! I'm not a terribly big fan of poetry but his lectures were insightful and informative. The assignments were reasonable. If you need a W credit then this class is highly recommended.
ABSOLUTELY AMAZING! I didn't want to miss a single lecture, he was sooo captivating.
no coment

Prof is SUPER nice & enthusiastic. Go to lectures, they are really helpful and his final is based on alot of the things he talked about. Didn't get the grade I want but that's because of TA. He will give you an entire outline of his final and only things on the outline will be tested.
I didn't get the grade I wanted, but this prof is something else. He taught everything with conviction and that impressed me a lot. Don't expect easy work from him, but his class is a blessing.

V. interesting lectures, but can be a bit abstract at times.  Course wasn't too difficult but the term paper was v. long.  Believes his view on a poem is the only/correct one...can be a bit daunting, but, all in all, wasn't too bad.

Good prof with interesting views. Drills his take on things into you. Must attend lectures for notes given that he doesn't not have handouts/ taped lectures available online. Lectures are not deadly, but can becoming quite boring with the repetition and many examples he gives.

Can you say 'Kevin Spacey'?  Even if he couldn't teach, his looks are sufficient to get him by in life.  A brilliant professor and lecturer...I didn't even have to take notes!  Just wish classes started a bit later in the day.
Easy interesting lectures .... 1 or 2 chapters a week for reading. 1 writing assignment before the final essay. Final was pretty straightforward w/ essay teh end
Good prof but if you are looking to take this because you heard this was an easy course.  Move on.

he expects a lot from you! you have to write five papers and for the final exam you have to make sure you know the main themes for about 100 different poems. he assigns poems but never goes over them in class. your grade completely depends on how mean your TA is.
Dont take this class. Matt is a nice guy but the class is terrible. Very boring lectures, lots and lots of writing, hard to understand and overall not enjoyable.
I am so glad to drop this course. Definitely would not recommend.

Boring, extremely heavy courseload, super strict about class rules. No electronic devices, including LAPTOPS allowed in both lecture & tutorial. Mandatory attendance in tutorials although it doesn`t count for marks. LOTS of reading, LOTS of writing... and he is NOT hot -.-

Great english prof, he loved what he was teaching and tries to help his students whenever possible. As a lecturer he is quite boring, going over different types of poems and concepts but i wasn't sure which ones were important. As a TA, he is a very fair marker and super nice. I struggle through english myself and he helped a lot.
The class was fair overall...the essays were marked fairly, but lectures were extremely boring and useless as he only read long paragraphs of notes for an hour...

Easy class with lots of review. Kinda like redoing highschool english. Although those who said disagreeing with her bit you in the ass, I disagree. I blatantly disagreed with her reading of a poem on my first explication and got the exact mark I deserved for the quality of the writing in my essay.
She didn't really try to make lecture interesting.  Instead she used microscopic overhead notes.  I didn't think the class was difficult but definately not interesting.

The most boring class ever. I agree with the comment before mine. she's soon 2 be busted by the fashion police. cuz what she wears is most definately illegal. if she gave an extra 20 mins 2 copy notes maybe i would get them all. plus u r too busy copying notes 2 pay attention to what she is saying.

if anyone had trouble grasping the meanings of the concepts she was teaching, they are sleeping through the lectures!Pretty dry, and her overheads are way too long and she doesn't put them up online, but she explains eveything well. Someone should notify "What Not To Wear" she needs some style help
I'm sure glad that I had some previous experience with poetry. Otherwise, I'd be sunk.

I had a really hard time with her style of teaching. She seemed rather cold to me when I asked her questions. After I asked for her help on my assignment and talked to her for a bit, she has been much better, If she knows you are trying, she will marker you easier it seems.

don't like her. i haven't had her mark anything yet, but she seems hard. she's tecnically challenged, yet insists on using projections and sound clips and stuff, so lots of time is wasted trying to set that up. her notes are on slides and she feels the need to cover tehm so thry're hard to copy. boo
is interesting and tries to make class active
any class should be renamed "rick coe 101" since that's all that's ever discussed.
This class is probably the most boring class i've ever taken! Nicky shold be teaching elementary school so she can sings her poems with little kids!

Rather too perky, but quite helpful; she lays out the subject matter clearly.  She encourages participation, but if you happen to be sitting in her blind spot, you will not get called on even if your hand is raised for half an hour.
boring lectures sometimes, but easy marks for the webpage!! not a bad course, pretty straightforward material.  but she does seem motherly when teaching, at times... *shudder*

i never went to the lectures cuz they were pretty dull, but i like how she has all her notes online.  i also liked how 15% of our mark was on a webpage on a poem.  that was easy marks.... :) and her exams were pretty good too. no tricky stuff

I don't think she likes me very much.  She marks really hard.  Her comments are unclear on my essay.  It almost seems like she stereotyped me when I met her on the first day.  I would say she made the easiest english course the hardest for me
Very interesting and definitely knows his stuff well... Highly recommended :)

Very good professor. He is very passionate and makes lectures very interesting, I'm usually scrambling to write down as much as I can. Is very easy to approach and to bounce ideas off of about poems and passages of novels. Very helpful when you don't understand something. Would definitely take another course with him.
Good prof, makes things clear

Professor Alkan took a little bit of getting used to. But she is honestly one of the better professors I have had. She is so so so helpful as well, very welcome to discussing different ideas with students.

This was an ok class, the lectures at first were helpful but after the first essay they became pointless. The thing that bothered me about this class is the prof tries to force his views on the students, it was basically course teaching environmentalism. Not a Gpa booster butif u need an eng credit and dont wont to do a lot of work this is a choice
It's an interesting course, relatively easy. As long as you stay on top of the readings, you should do fine. Final is fair except you won't know which poems he's going to make you analyze with.

great guy, take notes in lecture however because when it comes down to the final, you have to identify random lines out of the 40 poems you have to read and write paragraphs on them. the essays if you start them on the last day, you'll end up with a C+. do them earlier and you will do not bad.

Although some of the modern stuff was a bit hard to get a head around, I really liked this guy's style, he tries to push the envelope with some of the experimental poetry, and really digs deep into the meanings and such- I found it very enlightening!

I can honestly say that Collis is the worst prof I've ever had. I am very intersted in poetry and took this class for that specific reason, but I havent learned ONE thing. If you are looking for an easy A, take this class, if you actually want to learn something and get value for your money, dont bother.

Stevie is awesome, he is totally engaged in his course.  He is happy to hang out with his students and gather teaching tips from them.  the course is laughable, but worthwile for the mere fact of being in his presence.  he is totally adorable and a great guy.
...could be better!
Each lecture is like she's reading an essay.  I like the way she gets the class involved but its mostly boring.  I wouldn't recommend her.
BORING
No Comments
Helpful and well learned...but...isn't what you would call enthusiastic...bring a pillow if English isn't your thing.
worst prof ever for english...reads from printed notes and can even messes it up
No Comments
if you are the type of person who likes to sleep in class, take this course
I'm still confused on what I have learned so far... or have I learned anything&#
Intelligent and Insightful..lectures r focused on what WE think
she is boring and can't pronounce poetry terms right
